column2: Fresh and tender hand-cut chicken tossed in a sweet and spicy chili-ginger sauce.
A longtime guest favorite. Crispy onion petals drizzled with housemade crema and served with a zesty dip.
Fresh, roasted mushrooms hand-stuffed with garlic herb cheese, topped with a Parmesan crust and served over a creamy blend of four melted cheeses.
We call these Firecrackers because they’re bursting with flavor! Spicy grilled chicken and cheese wrapped in a crispy flour tortilla, and served with a cool avocado-lime dipping sauce.
We start with crispy, hand-battered shrimp and put the flavor in overdrive with spicy cherry peppers, garlic butter and housemade ranch dressing. It’s so good you won’t want to share.
Crispy chicken wings with our signature seasoning, served with housemade blue cheese dressing and Buffalo sauce.
Pick either a Mixed Green or Caesar Salad. Then choose from one of our soups. Current selections include LongHorn Chili, Loaded Potato Soup, French Onion Soup or Shrimp & Lobster Chowder.
Choice of either Mixed Green Salad, Caesar Salad or Bowl of Soup.
Choice of either Mixed Green Salad, Caesar Salad or Bowl of Soup.
Choice of either Mixed Green Salad, Caesar Salad or Bowl of Soup.
Thick, juicy and expertly grilled to order, with your choice of cheese on a toasted potato bun. Served with our crave-worthy fries.
Topped with roasted mushrooms, Swiss cheese, steakhouse mayo and arugula on a toasted potato bun.
Loaded with applewood smoked bacon, housemade BBQ sauce, cheddar cheese and crispy onion straws.
Topped with shaved prime rib, Swiss cheese, crispy onion straws, arugula and steakhouse mayo on a toasted potato bun. Served with Parmesan Garlic Fries.
Fresh, hand-breaded chicken breast fried to order and topped with lettuce, onion, tomato dill pickles and housemade ranch.
Fresh grilled chicken breast topped with Havarti cheese, arugula and a roasted tomato aioli. Served on a toasted potato bun.
Shaved prime rib topped with onions, mushrooms and Swiss cheese on French bread.
Lean, fresh and grilled to order. Top USDA choice center-cut sirloin generously seasoned with a secret blend of spices, then grilled to perfection. Served with your choice of side.
Fresh 10 oz. ground beef, grilled and smothered with mushrooms, red wine sauce and onion straws. Choice of side.
Thick, tender steak with deep, hearty flavor. House marinated for extra flavor.
Cut fresh and hand-trimmed. 12 ounces of our most juicy and flavorful steak, distinguished by the rich marbling that runs through each cut. Served with your choice of side.

A guest favorite and named after one of our servers who loved this signature cut. Our most tender center-cut filet; lean yet succulent, mouth-watering buttery texture, and subtle flavor. Hand-seasoned and cooked to perfection. Served with choice of side.
Fire-grilled to enhance its distinctive flavor, this edge-to-edge thick cut is a steakhouse classic. Served with choice of side.
Two great cuts in one steak. A combination of the tenderness and delicate flavor of the filet and the richly marbled 16 oz Strip. Served with choice of side.
Well-marbled and tender, bone-in cut, grilled over an open flame for a rich, juicy flavor.
Fire-grilled 20 oz. USDA Choice seasoned bone-in porterhouse – a NY Strip and filet in one juicy cut. Served with choice of side.
The best that surf and turf have to offer. Our signature 6 oz. center-cut filet paired with a succulent cold-water lobster tail and melted butter. Served with choice of side.
Fresh, juicy and hand-breaded to order. Our fried chicken tenders are LongHorn® Guaranteed to satisfy every time. Served with our scratch-made mustard sauce.
Fresh, seared chicken breast with grilled mushrooms, tender artichoke hearts and roasted tomatoes in a light chardonnay butter sauce.
Always fresh, always tender chicken breasts expertly grilled with a creamy Parmesan, provolone and garlic cheese crust.
With tomato butter and rice, served with a choice of side.
Tender half or full-rack of BBQ ribs. Served with choice of side.
What's a steakhouse know about salmon? Plenty! Our hand-cut, fresh Atlantic Salmon is marinated in our secret bourbon marinade and grilled to flaky perfection. Served over rice and choice of side.
Hand-breaded chicken tenders over fresh field greens with 100% Wisconsin aged cheddar, diced Roma tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions and croutons.
Fresh, diced Roma tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, croutons and 100% Wisconsin aged cheddar on field greens.
Hand-chopped romaine tossed in-house Caesar dressing with croutons and shaved 10-month aged Parmesan cheese. With Chicken, Shrimp or Sirloin
Fresh, crisp field greens with grapes, strawberries, mandarin oranges, candied pecans, red onions and feta cheese. All tossed up in a sweet raspberry vinaigrette.
Fresh, hand-cut, bourbon-marinated Atlantic salmon over crisp field greens or Caesar.
Grilled, sliced sirloin with bold 7-pepper seasoning over fresh field greens with diced tomatoes, croutons and crumbled blue cheese.
Texas style all-beef chili with no beans. Boldly seasoned and finished with aged cheddar, red onions and jalapeños.
A steakhouse classic, topped with melted Swiss cheese.
Rich, creamy and brimming with steakhouse flavor. Topped with crunchy bacon, cheddar cheese and fresh green onions.
A hearty seafood experience. Shrimp & lobster in creamy chowder with corn, red bell peppers and potatoes.
We are taking the perfect sides to the next level.
Hand-chopped greens topped with the freshest ingredients.
Sides so tasty, you might eat them before your steak.
Try one of LongHorn's two hand-chopped side salads with your meal. Order either a Caesar or Mixed Green Salad today.
Take your steak to the next level with our Great Steak Additions.
Tangy lime and graham cracker crumbles topped with fresh whipped cream and a lime.
With Reese's Peanut Butter Cups.
You may need a friend to share our famous Chocolate Stampede® - it's that big! Six types of chocolate in peaks and layers that are served with vanilla bean ice cream. Serves two.
If only Mom's apple pie was this good. Fresh baked pie crust packed with sweet, juicy Fuji apples, topped with vanilla bean ice cream, and drizzled with caramel and raspberry sauce.
Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, topped with fresh strawberries, blueberries and whipped cream.
Rich dark chocolate with a creamy fudge center, served warm with vanilla bean ice cream.
Layers of shortcake, vanilla cream and strawberry jam with white chocolate shavings and fresh strawberries.
Drink your fill of our bottomless drinks. To Go beverages do not come with refills.
Rich, creamy & smooth since 1919.
Sometimes you need a warm-up.
Natural refreshment.
